headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://unpkg.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.myfilebase.com https://api.filebase.io wss://*.myfilebase.com; img-src 'self' https://*.myfilebase.com data:; media-src 'self' https://*.myfilebase.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self' data:; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
